commands_raw:
signal(portrait,none)
signal(line,hide)
signal(skinSelect,hide)
please use keyboard and mouse
---
-> char create
name: intro
char create
skin select
char confirmation

commands_raw:
Type text to work.
1 character = 1 credit.
signal(work,show)
?> Finish{
signal(work,save)
signal(work,hide)
Check what you can unlock with your new credits.
}
name: work

commands_raw:
*It is a letter.*
?> Read it{
Make sure you don't go numb.
Play games, look through the window, do something else than work to 
improve your mental state. :)
DON'T REACH 100% NUMB.
---
*Right beside the note there is a videogame called: Aberrant.*
---
*You take it*
signal(game,show)
}
name: tablet

commands_raw:
Watching the pink colored sky makes you feel better. 
---
Like there is something out there waiting for you to discover it.
---
Like the worlds is bigger than your room.
---
But it isn't.
name: Window1

commands_raw:
You try to remember what you wanted to be as an adult.
---
Games?
---
Game dev?
---
Nah. In this country there is no job for game dev.
---
Let's try software development and later try game dev.
---
We still have a life in front of us, there will be time.
---
Surely, there will be time...
name: Window2

commands_raw:
What was the last time you went outside?
---
That's right. You have been for years. 
---
But the door has been always open.
---
Why not leave?
---
Leave all of this behind.
---
Nah. This is fine.
--- 
Just need to work and buy everything I need.
No use to go outside.
name: Window3

commands_raw:
This is a nice view.
---
What else do you want? Working from home
---
You can have a quick peek outside when your eyes feel tired.
---
And it makes your spacework feel cozy.
name: Window4
